name: Sola
headline: Copilot for Robotic Process Automation
description:
Sola is copilot for workflow automation. 

We help automation-minded teams build robust robotic agents to handle tedious tasks via LLMs and computer vision, smoothly integrated into their standard workflow. 

Our tooling makes it easy for companies to automate data entry/scraping in manual filing and processing flows. Go from a screen recording to a bot in any desktop or browser workflow; develop logic and watch logic self-develop in the face of new events!
markdown:

Automate workflows with intelligence
Simulate any repetitive, manual workflow with a bot.
We help automation-minded teams build **robust robotic agents ü§ñ** to handle tedious tasks via LLMs and computer vision, smoothly integrated into the standard workflow.

[![Backed by Y Combinator](https://www.sola-solutions.com/_next/static/media/yct.a7152140.svg)](https://www.sola-solutions.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/J9s-sola-build-ai-agents-in-copilot>)
## RPA of the Future
### We make it easy for companies to automate data entry/scraping in filing and processing flows using LLMs and computer vision.
### No integrations, no lift üíª

Sola RPA is fully generalizable: compatible with any browser sites and desktop software.
[See the demo->](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/desktop>)
### Bots that learn üìö
![Bots that learn üìö](https://www.sola-solutions.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frpa2.2c07b80b.png&w=2048&q=75)
Build bots in copilot ‚Äì new logic is automatically built in to the existing workflow.
[See the demo->](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/legal-filing>)
### Simple interface, ‚àû possibilities üí´
![Simple interface, ‚àû possibilities üí´](https://www.sola-solutions.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frpa3.067bf65e.png&w=3840&q=75)
Go from screen recording -> annotated workflow -> bot in minutes.
[See the demo->](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/legal-filing>)
##  See the  possibilities...
We serve companies across legal, financial, insurance, and healthcare, enabling citizen developers for their team and process mining their existing workflow.
## [Legal Filing Flows, on CopilotLegaltechData EntryDemoWatch us build a bot for a legal incorporation flow in minutes.](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/legal-filing>)## [Desktop IntegrationsFinanceDemoWatch the workflow annotation process for non-browser applications.](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/desktop>)## [Scheduled knowledge extractionFinanceData ScrapingDemoSee intelligent data scraping, unstructured data processing in the workflow.](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/knowledge-extraction>)## [Scraping legacy systemsFinanceData ScrapingDemoExample automation for scraping interactions with legacy financial systems.](https://www.sola-solutions.com/</product/scraping-systems>)
![AI-Powered Automation graphic](https://www.sola-solutions.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fwap.95abee47.png&w=2048&q=75)
## WORKFLOW AUTOMATION PLATFORM
## AI-Powered Automation: RPA tooling built to scale
Craft seamless, AI-enhanced workflows in transforming your data entry, scraping, and filing operations. Gain full control and transparency across all processes with a centralized, intuitive tool and developer API integrations.
Ensure efficiency and scalability at the heart of your business.
Interested? Let's chat.
->
![Empowered Icon](https://www.sola-solutions.com/_next/static/media/empoweredIcon.2ad9216a.svg)
## WHO WE WORK WITH
## Empowering Industries: Our Impact Across Sectors
We strive to drive innovation across various sectors with our cutting-edge AI and computer vision technologies. Some of the recent customers we‚Äôve worked with include:
  * An SMB unicorn, in deploying bots tailored to each state's filing workflow, enhancing their operational efficiency.
  * A rapidly scaling neobank, employing our solutions to extract vital information from contracts on government financial websites.
  * An insurance company, for who we‚Äôve significantly streamlined claims processing and fraud detection procedures.


These success stories exemplify our commitment to optimizing workflows and driving business growth across a diverse range of industries.

generated_description:
**Sola: Your Copilot in Robotic Process Automation**

Founded in 2023 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, Sola is revolutionizing how businesses automate repetitive tasks. Based in Jersey City, NJ, with a small but mighty team of five, Sola's mission is simple yet powerful: to act as a copilot for robotic process automation (RPA). 

The idea is that automation-minded teams can leverage Sola's innovative tools to build robust robotic agents that handle tedious tasks‚Äîthink data entry, scraping, and filing‚Äîintegrated seamlessly into their existing workflows. No heavy lifting is required: you can literally go from a screen recording to a functional bot in a matter of minutes.

### How It Works
Sola utilizes advanced technologies, including large language models and computer vision, to empower teams to automate their workflow without the usual headaches. Their platform supports a variety of industries‚Äîlegal, financial, insurance, and healthcare‚Äîallowing "citizen developers" to easily harness automation within their teams. 

What‚Äôs particularly interesting about Sola is its ability to adapt. The bots can learn and evolve in response to new events, making them increasingly valuable over time. The interface is designed to be user-friendly, allowing anyone‚Äîregardless of technical expertise‚Äîto create bots that can take over those repetitive, mind-numbing tasks. 

### Real-World Impact
Sola isn't just theory; it's already making waves with various clients. They include a rapidly scaling neobank that needs to scrape critical data from financial websites and a unicorn startup that‚Äôs deploying bots for legal workflows across states. These implementations showcase Sola's commitment to not just automation, but real business growth.

In a landscape where efficiency is paramount, Sola positions itself as not just a tool, but a crucial partner for companies looking to streamline operations and enhance productivity.

So, if you're tired of drowning in paperwork and manual processes, it might be worth checking out what Sola has to offer. After all, the future of work is about smart automation that works alongside you, not against you. 

Curious to see it in action? [Book a demo](https://www.sola-solutions.com/contact) with Sola today! 

For more details, visit their website: [Sola Solutions](https://www.sola-solutions.com).
